title: Stream: Fall Out Boy – Save Rock And Roll
content:
No one in their right mind can claim that they aren’t excited about hearing this record.

Their first studio record since 2008’s Folie å Deux, Fall Out Boy… Save Rock And Roll is set to be released on 16 April. Preceded by the single My Song’s Know What You Did In The Dark (Light ‘Em Up) which charted at no.5 in the UK, and 26 in the US respectively. Produced by Butch Walker who has also worked with The Automatic, P!nk, Taylor Swift and Avril Lavigne, the group have also announced a full world tour to support the release.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
